alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 23 at 3:08PM MDT until June 23 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR CENTRAL WAYNE COUNTY... At 308 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly including Bull Creek in Hanksville. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes, streams, slot canyons and slickrock areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hanksville and Caineville. This includes the following highways... Utah Route 95 between mile markers 0 and 1. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 96 and 118. This includes the following streams and drainages... Fremont River to confluence with the Dirty Devil River and Bull Creek in Hanksville. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
